articles.title: So, Nakamura in quick draw, arrange tiebreaker for Grand Prix title - Rappler
articles.description: Foreign-born Americans Wesley So and Hikaru Nakamura opt for a quick draw in the second game of their FIDE Grand Prix third leg final
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines What was supposed to be a classical title duel between Wesley So and Hikaru Nakamura has been transformed into a rapid tiebreaker.

articles.title: NASA May Still Rename James Webb Telescope Over Homophobia Controversy - Futurism
articles.description: New reporting from Scientific American leaves open the possibility that NASA could still change the name of the James Webb Space Telescope.
articles.content: A hard hitting new story from Scientific American offers new details about NASAs refusal to change the name of the James Webb Space Telescope following accusations of homophobia on the part of its na… [+4094 chars]
